About DVD Pila!


The word Pila is Spanish for Pile, and I have a pile of DVDs that I’d like to rip and record that I have ripped them.

This project is also an excuse to learn Ember.js and use the Bourbon SASS mixin library.

Here are some additional projects that DVD Pila! uses:

Project Reason
Python The server is written in Python, so we’ll go ahead and list it first.
Flask Basically used for database CRUD operations, and I’ve wanted to learn Flask for a while.
psycopg2 Have to be able to connect to the PostgreSQL database from Python, and this does the job, woo.
PostgreSQL A cool database I have wanted to use for a while, and you gotta store your data somewhere.
Ember.js The project was started as an excuse to learn this great framework.
Ember Data Integrated REST API to database.
Sass A lot more fun writing CSS with SASS
Bourbon Refills I’m not great at making things look good, and having pre-defined elements is great.
Moment.js This great library of JavaScript time functions isn’t used that much, but it’s worth a mention.
Handlebars A dependency of Ember, but a great JavaScript template system that I’d like to use in other projects.

Smoosh all these projects together with some code from various blogs, StackOverflow questions, etc, and I give you DVD Pila!.

Hope you enjoy!

Party On!
